name: Droxic
description:
We are Droxic Digital Agency a member of BIMA and Sitecore partner. We have young and talented team of around 50 specialists in different areas of the digital. Some of our partners in UK are Exposure, Precedent, Oliver, BlueLeaf, BoxUK, DogDigital, AKQA, Proximity. Alongside our strong skills in UX and Development we are a truly reliable and trusted partner. Our agency-centric model is built on very good relationships and collaborating seamlessly as part of the agency’s team.
Achieving great results, we have the proper workflow in place, the appropriate project management systems and the understanding of the certain communication level. We speak the same language and have same goals with our partners - success of our end clients and bringing their businesses to higher level of prosperity.
